town.name: Doctor
town.abilities: Heal one person each night, preventing them from dying.
town.attributes: You may only heal yourself once. You will know if your target is attacked.

town.name: Escort
town.attributes: Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. If you target a Serial Killer, they will attack you.

town.name: Jailor
town.abilities: You may choose one person during the day to jail for the night.
town.attributes: You may choose to execute your prisoner. The jailed target cannot perform their night ability. While jailed the prisoner is safe from all attacks.

town.name: Mayor
town.abilities: You may reveal yourself as the Mayor of the Town.
town.attributes: Once you have revealed yourself as the Mayor your vote counts as 3 votes. You may not be healed once you have revealed.

town.name: Bodyguard
town.abilities: Can protect one person for 1 night

mafia.name: Godfather
mafia.attributes: You can't be killed at night. If there is a Mafioso, he will attack the target instead of you. You wake up with the other Mafia at night.
mafia.goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

mafia.name: Mafioso
mafia.attributes: You can kill if the Godfather doesn't give you orders. If the Godfather dies, you will become the next Godfather. You wake up with the other Mafia at night.
mafia.goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

neutral.name: Jester
neutral.abilities: Trick the Town into voting against you.
neutral.attributes: If you are lynched, you may kill one of your guilty or abstaining voters the following night.
neutral.goal: Get yourself lynched by any means necessary.

neutral.name: Serial Killer
neutral.attributes: If you are role blocked, you will attack the role blocker in addition to your target. You can choose to be cautious and not kill role blockers.
neutral.goal: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

neutral.name: Survivor
neutral.abilities: Put on a bulletproof vest at night, protecting yourself from attacks.
neutral.attributes: You have a limited number of vests. Using a vest grants you night immunity for that night.
neutral.goal: Live until the end of the game.
